result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Public Defender appointment

Hearing on February 7, 2023 at 09:00 am.

Jury trial on March 9, 2023 at 08:30 am.

No violent or abusive contact with C.M.M.L.  Contact can only be accomplished via telephone or electronic means but may not be accomplished via in person contact.  No contact with C.D.M.L. unless and until 21FA328 addresses the issue and creates a placement protocol.

9:15 AM . Defendant Yordany J Morales Lopez in court.  Attorney Annie E Getsinger in court for Yordany J Morales Lopez.  Attorney Gabriel David Arevalo in court for State of Wisconsin.  Interpreter, Jim Larson - S&T.  Victim notification has been met.  State objects to the bond modification and states argument.  Atty Getsinger recommends supervised contact by a family member.  Court modifies bond as follows:  No violent or abusive contact with C.M.M.L.  Contact can only be accomplished via telephone or electronic means but may not be accomplished via in person contact.  No contact with C.D.M.L. unless and until 21FA328 addresses the issue and creates a placement protocol.
Atty Getsinger received and waives reading of Information and stands mute to both counts.  DE advised of charges and penalties. Court enters Not Guilty Plea, set for trial.  Bond continues.

9:15 AM . Defendant Yordany J Morales Lopez in court.  Attorney Annie E Getsinger in court for Yordany J Morales Lopez.  Attorney Gabriel David Arevalo in court for State of Wisconsin.  Interpreter, Jim Larson - S&T.  Atty Getsinger advises she went over the waiver form last week by telephone with the use of an Interpreter and filled in same with DE's answers.  Atty Getsinger advises she confirmed DE's answers were still the same today.  DE confirms he went over the form again today.  DE agrees Court can rely on the Complaint and bind him over for further proceedings.  Atty Getsinger satisfied waiver is free, knowing and voluntary.  Atty Getsinger stipulates to the Complaint for bind over.  State also stipulated.  Court finds waiver to be free, knowing and voluntary and finds probable cause, bind over for Br 3.
Motion hearing on August 10, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Waiver of Prelim on August 10, 2022 at 09:00 am.

10:04 a.m.  Prosecuting attorney Gabriel David Arevalo in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Yordany J Morales Lopez not in court.  Attorney Annie E Getsinger in court for Yordany J Morales Lopez.  Court states case and appearances.  Atty Getsinger makes record that DE called and is ill and is therefore requesting a reset of the prelim to the 8/3 date which already has a MH set.  State doesn't object.  Court resets.
Waiver of Prelim scheduled for August 3, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Waiver of Prelim on August 3, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Motion hearing on August 3, 2022 at 10:30 am.

records.addlTxt:
1:25 PM Prosecuting attorney Natalia J Gess in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Yordany J Morales Lopez not in court.  Attorney Annie E Getsinger in court for Yordany J Morales Lopez. Interpreter, E.S. is also present at the courthouse.  Atty Getsinger explains DE did try contacting her prior to court today and was unable to speak with him but DE is at work and had issues.  Matter recalled at 1:27 PM.  Defendant, Yordany J. Morales Lopez NOW appears in person.  All other appearances remain the same.  Interpreter - S&T.  Atty Getsinger requests matter be set for preliminary hearing.  Matter reset. Atty Getsinger advises she is listed as attorney of record but there is no formal order appointing her.  She will provide DE with the appropriate paperwork. Bond continues.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 28, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Preliminary hearing and Arraignment on July 28, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Return date on May 19, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Booking today; No contact w/C.M.M.L. & C.D.B. (d/o/b 2/21/14) & C.D.M.L. or their residences, places of employment or schools.

01:29 PM Defendant Yordany J Morales Lopez in court with attorney Annie E Getsinger and interpreter Fred S..  Natalia J Gess appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant received and waives reading of complaint.  Court advises DE of charges/max penalties. Time limits waived for preliminary hearing.  $2000.00 SIGNATURE bond set.  Special bond conditions as follows:  Booking today; No contact w/C.M.M.L. & C.D.B. (d/o/b 2/21/14) & C.D.M.L. or their residences, places of employment or schools.  Return date scheduled for May 19, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
